title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5005 - Applications For Retirement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5005 - Applications For Retirement

State Regulations
§ 5005.1 - Who may file a retirement application
§ 5005.2 - Acknowledgment of signature
§ 5005.3 - Effective date of service, disability and deferred retirement applications
§ 5005.4 - Withdrawal of application for retirement
§ 5005.5 - Early service retirement reductions in the case of members with a date of membership on or after January 1, 2010
§ 5005.6 - Early service retirement reductions in the case of Tier 6 members

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5005

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§504, 509, 510, 511, 511-a, 512-a, 535, 539;Retirement and Social Security Law, §
603[i]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
